attributes.description: 2022 Car Of The Year Winner – 4x4 Double-Cab Segment!, 160-Point Quality Checked, DEKRA Roadworthy, One Previous Owner, Very Low Mileage – Like New!, Balance Of 6 Years / 150 000 Km Factory Warranty, Balance Of 6 Years / 90 000 Km Service Plan, EXTRAS: Towbar, Rollbar, Tonneau cover, Rubberising, Bonnet guard, Nudge bar, FEATURES: Intelligent Around View Monitor, Rear Cross Traffic Alert, 8" Touch-Screen Display, Payload 1,086 kg, Headlights LED, 12V Outlet Inside Load Box, Navigation, Leather seats, USB Port (USB-Ax3 & USB-Cx1), Automatic air conditioning with dual zone climate control, Rear air vents in centre console, Power windows with driver auto up/down button, Rear screen power sliding, Remote central locking, Auto door lock, Keyless Entry, Push Button Start, Steering wheel controls, Driver and front passenger airbags, Side airbags, Curtain airbags, Driver knee airbag, ISOFIX child seat anchorage, Anti-lock Braking System (ABS), Electronic Brake force Distribution (EBD), Brake Assist (BA), Vehicle Dynamic Control (VDC), Trailer Stability Assist (TSA), Hill Start Assist (HSA), Reverse camera and sensors, Intelligent Emergency Braking, Intelligent Forward Collision Warning, Intelligent Driver Alertness, Blind Sport Warning (BSW), Lane Departure Warning (LDW), Rear Cross Traffic Alert, High Beam Assist (HBA), Cruise Control, Rain-sensing Wipers and MANY MORE! EASY FINANCE AVAILABLE - ALL TRADE-IN’S WELCOME – NATIONWIDE DELIVERIES.

attributes.description: Action Ford Modimolle is a proud member of CFAO Motors South Africa. Our network re-present us across the country with the opportunity to leave our footprint in various brands. We pride ourselves to the top level of quality service that is well known within Ford SA's extremely high standards in our range of New and Approved Pre - Owned vehicles. Our well trained Team of Sales Executive's eagerly await your request to assist and find the right vehicle to fit your personal needs, with our expert onsite Business Manager that will structure the best possible deal to suit your financial needs. Our top notch Technical Team and Parts department will cater for your every need and assist with friendly service in our ongoing effort to treat you, our best asset, with care and professionalism, to ensure our service levels meet with your high demand! We think this to be a good time for you to contact us!

attributes.description: The light and compact Suzuki Swift with its 1.2l petrol engine offers high output and exceptional fuel consumption at as little as 4.9l / 100km. Every detail of the third-generation Swift has been cleverly designed to make you feel at one with your new car. The Swift’s floating roof design, solid shoulder lines, and rich side body sculpting unite to give you a driving experience that thrills. Its low, short, wide stance has a presence that can’t be ignored, making you stand out wherever you go. Designed to give you all the right feels, the new Suzuki Swift is a bold statement in design and style. Book your test drive today...
